H0.text: where do kidneys for kidney transplant come from. Deceased Organ Donors

H1.text: where do kidneys for kidney transplant come from. Xenotransplantation (Animal Donors)

H2.text: where do kidneys for kidney transplant come from. Stem Cell-Derived Kidneys

H3.text: where do kidneys for kidney transplant come from. living - donor

A4.text: The Iranian system began in 1988 and eliminated the shortage of kidneys by 1999.

A5.text: Within the first year of the establishment of this system, the number of transplants had almost doubled; nearly four-fifths were from living unrelated sources.
